title: Can the Vikings Win the NFC North?
description:
Danny Heifetz is joined by The Ringer’s new NFL writer, Sheil Kapadia, to discuss some of his hottest takes heading into the 2022-23 season.
Host: Danny Heifetz
Guest: Sheil Kapadia
Associate Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Additional Production Supervision: Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
